prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with shiny scales and a spiky tail.

Generate an image of a Pokemon resembling a dragon with an elegant design.
Make a cute dragon Pokemon with vibrant colors and a playful expression.
Imagine a bipedal dragon Pokemon that stands out with its bright features.
Design a Pokemon that embodies both strength and charm, with dragon-like elements.
Give me a fierce-looking dragon Pokemon that can blend into its forest habitat.
